b'"...can and must, do better for our students \xe2\x80\x93 all of them. Because we must do better for our future." 2/2 @BetsyDeVosED'
b'"The future of choice lies in recognizing America \xe2\x80\x93 the greatest country in the history of mankind..." 1/2 @BetsyDeVosED'
b'"The future of choice lies in funding and supporting individual students, not systems or buildings." @BetsyDeVosED'
b'"...and more about the individual students that \xe2\x80\x9cschool\xe2\x80\x9d seeks to serve." @BetsyDeVosED 5/5'
b'"The future of choice lies in caring less about the word that comes before school...\xe2\x80\x9d @BetsyDeVosED 4/5'
b'"No more \xe2\x80\x9cchoice for me, but not for thee,\xe2\x80\x9d from politicians in Washington, or in state houses." @BetsyDeVosED 3/5'
b'"...not just those who have the power, prestige or financial wherewithal to make choices." @BetsyDeVosED 2/5'
b'"The future of choice lies in trusting and empowering parents \xe2\x80\x93 all parents..." @BetsyDeVosED 1/5'
b'"We can rethink school by embracing the future of education as one that fully integrates choice into every decision we make." @BetsyDeVosED'
b'"We can be bold. We can be unafraid. We can choose to do what\xe2\x80\x99s right not because it\xe2\x80\x99s easy, but because it\xe2\x80\x99s hard.\xe2\x80\x9d @BetsyDeVosED'
b'"Time and again, studies have shown more options yield better results, for all students." @BetsyDeVosED'
b'"...that allow parents more opportunity to access more educational options to serve their kids\xe2\x80\x99 needs." @BetsyDeVosED 2/2'
b'"Today, 26 states and the District of Columbia offer more than 50 different private school choice programs..." @BetsyDeVosED 1/2'
b'"Each should be free to pursue avenues that lead each child to his or her fullest future." @BetsyDeVosED 2/2'
b'"States are different, families are dynamic & children are unique." @BetsyDeVosED 1/2'
b'"I believe in students, and I trust parents." @BetsyDeVosED'
b'"I\xe2\x80\x99m for parents having access to the learning environment that\xe2\x80\x99s the right fit for their child." @BetsyDeVosED'

b'Secretary King is taking questions from the audience @amprog https://t.co/gp2BcHiVnm'
b'Summon the will to work together and be rewarded with an even greater, fairer, more prosperous nation to pass on to our kids #FutureofEd'
b'We cannot afford to disagree about the need to make choices that reflect the best interests of students #FutureofEd'
b'From teachers to business leaders to elected officials to parents and community activists, we must all be a part of the solution #FutureofEd'
b'There are schools that deceive students, derail their dreams, and defraud taxpayers. There\xe2\x80\x99s no place for those schools #FutureofEd'
b'We do students a disservice if we focus on access and affordability without also supporting completion. #FutureofEd'
b'That starts by refusing to turn back the clock to a time when billions intended to help students went to wasteful subsidies for big banks'
b'We must continue to invest in making college more accessible and affordable. #FutureofEd'
b"Invest in each other because we can't build fences high enough to divorce our own children\xe2\x80\x99s fate from that of others #FutureofEd"
b'Many children in Detroit or CHI or PHIL can only dream of having the types of schools that their peers a few miles away enjoy every day.'
b'Even successful strategies will fail without the funds \xe2\x80\x93 especially in the schools where change is most needed. #FutureofEd'
b'And supporters of charters-myself included-must recognize the grave threat that ineffective ones pose to the entire sector #FutureofEd'
b'If we believe that public schools is the bedrock of American democracy, we should welcome good charters as innovation labs #FutureofEd'
b'RT @TeriLynHinds: .@JohnKingatED ..and all those without postsecondary ed are trying to fit through the remaining 5 doors. #FutureofEd http\xe2\x80\xa6'
b'Let\xe2\x80\x99s resist a false choice between allowing public charter schools and supporting traditional public schools #FutureofEd'
b'And we can do this without crowding out learning and instruction #FutureofEd'
b'Without accountability, standards are meaningless and equity is a charade. #futureofed'
b"Let's fight side by side for the belief that every student in America has the right to a great public education #FutureofEd"
b'Today we have a choice to make. We can continue to argue amongst ourselves or we can work together in pursuit of larger goals. #FutureofEd'
b'Some will argue that equity conflicts w/liberty but it\xe2\x80\x99s not liberty when birth binds a child to a life of limited possibilities #FutureofEd'
b'We must continue to press on, firm in the knowledge that when we pull others up, they do not pull us down. #FutureofEd'
b'But, make no mistake; education has always been central to our progress. #FutureofEd'
b'The history of public education in America is a stutter-step toward ambitiousness, inclusiveness, equity and excellence. #FutureofEd'
b'Now is the moment for us to set aside the differences that we have let divide us. #FutureofEd'
b'For all who believe that strong, equitable public education is central to a healthy democracy #FutureofEd'
